data.feedback: Well-structured clean architecture plan with proper story sequencing and dependencies. Minor inconsistencies regarding existing infrastructure (Dio vs http, existing SecureStorage) are implementation details that developers can resolve using the existing patterns.

issues.description: Story 2 mentions http package but should use existing ApiClient with Dio
issues.recommendation: Developers should use sl<ApiClient>() from DI container

issues.description: Story 2 mentions adding flutter_secure_storage but it already exists

suggestions: Update story 2 description to reference existing ApiClient and SecureStorage
Clarify in story 2 that AuthLocalDataSource should wrap existing SecureStorage
Add note about registering auth dependencies in injection_container.dart
